description.value:
Your dawning understanding of reality and the fa√ßadelike nature of time and space allows you to take "shortcuts" through time itself. Once per day you can tell the DM that your turn has come up again. Treat this action as if you had chosen to take the delay action (even if you took your last turn normally without delaying).

Published in Dragon Magazine Annual, Dragon Magazine 366, page(s) 25.
